channel.title: Lo-Fi Python - spreadsheets, data analysis, google sheets

item.title: Importing and Analyzing Data With Google Sheets Functions
item.description: This post focuses on Google Sheets formulas, rather than Python. If you're interested in accessing Google Sheets with Python, check out this post I wrote about the pygsheets library. I haven't personally tried it, but xlwings also looks like a decent option if you're looking for Google Sheets Python libraries â€¦
item.dc:creator: lofipython
